p: Further, the major neurological hallmarks of the SARS-CoV-2 observed in three classes, CNS manifestations comprising confusion, dizziness, cephalgia, impaired consciousness, convulsion, critical cerebrovascular pathologies, and ataxia. In contrast, neuropathic pain, gustatory/olfaction dysfunctions, and ophthalmic pathologies affect peripheral and musculoskeletal systems [15], [25].
